website_summaries.verdict: Build body balance on this fun and functional 3-wheel scooter.
pros: Adjustable height for multiple ages from 7 to adult
Folds up for easy storage and portability
Wheels prevent kids from getting fingers caught
cons: Difficult to store as the folding mechanism does not lock

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for me from my husband. The first time I saw one of these at Toys R Us (rest in sad peace) I felt the kid in me come out. You know - I don't care who is watching or what people think - I just wanted to jump on and feel the adventure. It is great for me as a mom going alongside my two kids (ages 3 & 6). This way, if they need me on their bikes I can dismount fast and help them. And ....... it's just fun!
customer_reviews.author: Charity RB

customer_reviews.title: Real Child Pleaser
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand daughter. It arrived on time and exactly as ordered. She and her friends love it. It was the hit of her birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Jerald Schutte

customer_reviews.title: FUN FUN FUN
customer_reviews.text: FUN FUN FUN. My granddaughter received one for her 5th birthday and I thought ,"NANA WANTS ONE". Great exercise and safe. Great quality. Don't hesitate "GROWN UPS". We can have fun too and not pay hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice A Kirchner

customer_reviews.title: Super simple to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to assemble. Just screw on the handle bars. So much fun to ride! I’m not athletic. I go to a yoga class once a week and that’s about it. I got the hang of this in no time! I need a little more strength to do well going up hill, but it’s really easy to scoot uphill. It’s fun to drift and not difficult to stop. It feels like how it felt to wheel around the skating rink as a kid. My 9yo asked for one for his birthday. And my 37 yo husband did too! We all had to take turns on this today! Buy it. It’s fun!
customer_reviews.author: H. B. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Very good and durable product
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these from AODI. One for 6yrs and and the other was for 8yrs and up. Unfortunately, we had to return the 8 yrs old and up (mine) due to the fact that the height adjust pin was not working (popping back in) and the bar fell out - very dangerous when going down hill. However, for this specific 6 yr old one. My 7 yr old daughter has been on it for about 3 times now. She loves it. It is very durable and fits her perfectly. Recommend buying wrist guards, elbow pads, and knee pads. These go pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Van

customer_reviews.title: to my surprise they both mastered the scooter like pros. Easy to assemble only needed to attach ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scooter for my 7 and 5 year old grandsons along with the Space Scooter thinking that the 3 wheeler would be a challenge for them. But, to my surprise they both mastered the scooter like pros. Easy to assemble only needed to attach the handle bar. Excellent purchase, hours of fun - So much fun we end up buying a second scooter so the boys could ride together.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this with his birthday gift cards for his 10th birthday. I (mom) put it together in 5-10 minutes. It is super easy to assemble and use. So far so good! He is average size and it is perhaps a bit big for him but he seems to ride just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kym E. Riden

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! My 6 year old and my 34 year old husband both love this!! It is so fun to ride! Product is good quality materials. Looks like advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Knewman

customer_reviews.title: Wiggle up some fun
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty scooter. Although there are instructions in the box they are obviously written by someone who's language is not English. Took about 20 minutes of figuring out where it goes together. Once assembled it’s pretty gangly looking but its due to the fact your supposed to wiggle to get it moving which I assume its not perfectly straight. That bugger flies once it gets rolling. My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Scooter makes a big hit at birthday party!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 11 year old grandson. It was a big hit. Everyone wanted to try it. As it could hold up adults as well as children, even Granddad had a turn, although the kids caught on faster than he did. The next day the two youngsters asked ,”Can we go outside?” When asked why, they replied, “We want to ride the thing.” They are not sure what to call it, but they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Gail

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Fun
customer_reviews.text: Absolute Fun! Love it, well made, and tons of fun!! Great low impact exercise, so much much fun you don't even realize how much of a work out your having. My 8 years old like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon lei

customer_reviews.title: Awesome adjustable scooter
customer_reviews.text: This scooter made me aunt if the year. I hot this for my nephew and ge hasn't stopped using it. My brother in law put it together and said it was simple. It is adjustable, so he will have it as he grows. It is made of quality parts so it will last a really long time. Plus the adults have been using it too. It is a great work out since you need to move your body to move the scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: The scooter took about 15 /20 minutes to assemble. It has 3 different breaks, which makes it safe . One hand break & two break peddles in front of the rear wheels . We gave it to our 10 year old great nephew for his birthday. He loves it . You swing it rock to make it move . They were more money at big boxed stores & this is very good quality for the price . It’s sturdy & safe.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swing scooter!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's 7 year old birthday present. It looks great,it is very strong and easy to assemble.For a 7 year old, the swing scooter is not very big, we chose the black one, it can be used very big. It's more fun than a normal scooter, my daughter's swinging feet, swinging body, very good sports equipment, my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: yizhong wang

customer_reviews.title: fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my brother who has autism. He enjoyed using this because it has two legs to rest your feet on. It took about 20 minutes for us to put together. It is pretty durable and the brakes are good and functionable. This was meant for kids but any teenager or adult can use it too. It is the perfect size. It comes with the tools you need to assemble it, too. If anyone is looking for a swing scooter, this is not a bad option at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Front Wheel Alignment off
customer_reviews.text: Got mine a few days ago, but the front wheel is not aligned well with the handle bar. There is also alit of play in the handle bar - you can move it left and right a bit before the wheel will turn.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Holt

customer_reviews.title: Fun scooter with some issues.
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like this scooter, only problem is that the break lever is loose on the handlebars and slides around, making the break unusable. Other issue is that the foot pad is peeling off only after 3 uses! I have pretty tiny kids.... My son isn’t even 50 lbs yet at almost 9 years old. So, not quite sure what happened!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Some imperfections but good scooter for its price
customer_reviews.text: The scooter shipped with all wrapped and well protected, but once I started to open up, there are scratches in many places, also some screws were rusted. However, it is still considered as a good buy for the price since both child and adult could ride. It became very useful during shutter-in-Place period. If you don’t mind the conditions mentioned above, it’s not bad after all.
customer_reviews.author: FrancisH

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed riding it
customer_reviews.text: Finally found something I enjoy to ride and also makes me lose weight. The scooter is amazing, and the quality is great. It can be easily folded so you can take it wherever you want. I enjoyed riding it in the parks. It is hard to ride in a not flat areas so be sure to find flat areas to enjoy riding it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and loads of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old and her friends love this! Best purchase ever! I was not sure if she would be able to ride, but this quickly became her favorite outside toy. We always take it to the parks. Great for learning balance. Use knee pads and wrist/head protection. Not for 50 year olds - first time I tried it while taking it back to the SUV, fell on the knee and a month later, I still can’t sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tahir Kelleci

customer_reviews.title: Lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for my boy getting back outdoors with his friends instead of on his all the time. Easy to put together and folds down . so it takes up only a small space when not in use . A really nice scooter, good quality and it moves smoothly. Really good better fun than the normal scooter .
customer_reviews.author: jianzhi cai

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It has its quirks but can’t complain about the price! It holds my adult wife well
customer_reviews.author: carl sanders

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Came with zero screws, no Velcro straps, and no handle bar cover. Tried to assemble Christmas Eve night for my son to wake up to Christmas morning already assembled. Huge disappointment. You can tell someone already returned once as well. Why wouldn’t they check the box after something was returned???
customer_reviews.author: sweetnurse

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: He loves this scooter! It gets him outside in the fresh air and is great exercise
customer_reviews.author: Bubee

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter
customer_reviews.text: What a great gift for my almost 8 year old. Assembles in minutes. Easy to fold and store. surdy design. He loves to ride on it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Well built and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have made through Amazon! My son loves his scooter, he literally rides it every day and it has held up under all of the use. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shaleigh85

customer_reviews.title: great fun & good exercise too!!
customer_reviews.text: loved how easy it was for my 6 yr old grandson to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Rios

customer_reviews.title: This scooter is so much fun and a great work out
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is so much fun and a great work out. I have found leaning back a bit really gets your speed up and it can move pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Blueberry

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My mother bought this for my daughter for her 7th birthday. It was very easy to assemble and she was a pro at it within 5 minutes. Its a great sturdy toy that she loves and I love that she goes begs to ride it rather than stuck on her ipad. She has never fallen or even came close but I do recommend that kids wear a helmet
customer_reviews.author: Delilah o.

customer_reviews.title: Came scratched and dented
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and found dents and scratches everywhere. Very upset. I am only writing this review because I bought this product based on the positive reviews that were giving and I am extremely disappointed in the condition of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it. I am trying to return. Not worth it. “Michael” “Clark”
customer_reviews.author: Zerdali

customer_reviews.title: SO FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth ride, feels sturdy enough for adults. I wish I would have purchased 2 of them so I wouldn’t have to share with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My son is 10 and it was a perfect fit for him! He loves it and it's great exercise! Took a little getting used to at first, but now he's riding it all around! I would definitely recommend getting one, even as an adult!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons love
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 and 9 yr old grandsons. They both love it. I've since bought another one. As much as they play with these, it's definitely with the price.
customer_reviews.author: NurseinOhio

customer_reviews.title: Nice scooter missing a part and damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged and it had minor damage. It is pack uber tight in a box and has the propensity to be damaged. It came missing a washer and the wrench that is shipped with it was useless on the nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary R Brackin

customer_reviews.title: Can light up wheels be ordered for this scooter
customer_reviews.text: Brought two for My Granddaughters they love them. They want the lights for the wheels. Where can I buy
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: When I received box it looked like it was already opened then taped back up. When we put it together the handle bars were crooked. It was my 11 year old daughters Christmas present. I hope I can return it and hopefully get a new one to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my 6 years old granddaughter she loves it. Wants the lights where can ai buy
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Hardware issues!
customer_reviews.text: This scooter was great when purchased. My child loved it and it was a good value. However, after riding a few times, hardware on the scooter became loose and stripped and started falling off. We’ve tried replacing with new hardware, but the metal on the actual scooter must be stripped and we can’t tighten it anymore. The steering is crooked and very wiggly. Waiting for a response from the company.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Our little daughter birthday is coming so we bought this scooter for her as a birthday gift.after receiving this scooter it doesn’t take much time for us to unwrap and assemble.after she received this scooter she took it out and ride it right away.she is so happy with this scooter.the quality of this scooter is very good and easy handling.we are very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cici chen

customer_reviews.title: She loves the color
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The color was very important. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton W Perales

customer_reviews.title: Intersting Swing ride for toddler and youngs kids!!
customer_reviews.text: First time when I saw the add for swing scooter, I impressed and surprised that how it works with swing. I order it and I love it specially my kids. It have very strong material to hold up to 200 lbs weight, attractive and nice color combination. It is very easy to ride on road, driveway and walkway. very nice product for gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: Good workout for kids...
customer_reviews.text: All 3 grandsons between 5 & 12 use this scooter, although it takes some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: DEEDA

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love them. It's simple to put together. It's 99% together when you get it. A great gift got my 9 year old and 7 year old. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Price point is great!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy it was a bit challenging to put together but kids love it so much we ordered a 2nd one!
customer_reviews.author: Luis C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun to ride !
customer_reviews.text: Smooth riding and fun, my son rides it everyday since we bought it . From rocking motion to 360 turning , so much more than a Scooter, his little sister who is almost 4 gave it try and she love it too . She could balance and steer without problem. Very cool scooter , easy to put together and folds up quick for easy transporting .
customer_reviews.author: jackie david

customer_reviews.title: very light
customer_reviews.text: This scooter can be placed anywhere. Also adults and children can play it. It's very light.
customer_reviews.author: feifei

customer_reviews.title: Screws
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this scooter. The only thing I don't like about it are the bolts/screws and the price. It's so hard to lock it in place and to twist it to tighten to assemble the scooter. I don't even want to disassemble it for storage anymore after use because I have a hard time setting it up. I find it pricey too.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: waste of money directions did not match up
customer_reviews.text: this product is horrible put together and it’s missing washers for the bolts on handle bars... handle bars keep loosening and flipping around my son was very disappointed so not buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if they have the foot holders in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they have the foot holders in the right place, on one side, it pulls to one side. I have purchased 3 of these, this is the only one that does that.
customer_reviews.author: kkndw

customer_reviews.title: Overall good scooter
customer_reviews.text: The breaks went out very quickly, but the scooter still works. My daughter loves it. Love that it can fold down. I do wish there was a lock when it is folded down so you could pick it up and move it without it falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves it and flies around seemingly effortlessly. She got the hang of it shortly very quickly after hoping on the 1st time.
customer_reviews.author: John Z

customer_reviews.title: Solid Scooter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 145lb, 4rd grader, who needs to stay active. She absolutely loves this scooter. I'm so glad that we purchased it. We are out in the community everyday scooting around, while I walk with her. The scooter was easy to assemble and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Fun but broke after 6 mos
customer_reviews.text: My son loves riding this scooter but the handlebar broke within 6 months of use. Hoping the manufacturer will make this right and replace the handle bar so he can ride it again.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: It looks fun, I saw a boy at a park riding one.
customer_reviews.text: I have not opened the package . It is a Christmas present for my grandson. I am concerned because the package came quite damaged and torn. I will open it and make sure the scooter is in good shape
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: my friends 9 years girl was elated by this gift ! it is sturdy, easy to put together and seems fun!
customer_reviews.author: thomas engler

customer_reviews.title: My kids favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and harder than it looks (for you adventurous moms!) but the kids love it (8,10, & 12).
customer_reviews.author: Renee Lee

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Kids LOVE it, but then again so do the adults
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli

customer_reviews.title: scooter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old granddaughter who just loves it! I got this when it was on sale and free s/h.
customer_reviews.author: peg

customer_reviews.title: Swing scooter
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids, my daughter and wife love it. Great way to exercise and have fun.
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: The Kid LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: our 5 yr old got this for his birthday and absolutely loves it. He's able to keep up with the neighborhood children on their Razors and they're a bit jealous of his ability to "drift"!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice. My 7 year old loves it. It is pretty heavy though. Easy to put together. If you want to throw it in the trunk to travel, its a pain to fold up. Price is a bit high for a kid scooter. You can buy a bicycle for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 7 year old

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these scooters. Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this scooter. We had one small issue with a part breaking but we contacted the company and they were quick to send a replacement part. Here’s to many more hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: S. Stilwill

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The brakes don’t work - amazon gave me manufacture contact and they never responded.
customer_reviews.author: FAJ

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and could ride them for hours.
customer_reviews.author: M.V

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good value
customer_reviews.text: The instruction guide to assembly is awful. Very poor instructions but fortunately little to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: great fun for my grandson who is 11 and good exercise
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and I was even able to ride it. Worthwhile purchase and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the scooter. It was easy to fix and the breaks work great. However storing it is hard. It cannot lock as advertised and the piece given to hold it in place was way to small.
customer_reviews.author: kristine Bennett

customer_reviews.title: It got broken already!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been only 2 weeks since we got it, and it got broken already. In the description, there should be a one year warranty, but we are not getting any response.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Hand break doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The scooter itself is great and my son loves it, but the break doesn’t work. Unfortunately that makes the scooter quite unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Given as a Christmas gift. The main weld broke five days after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Pulcher

customer_reviews.title: Best present
customer_reviews.text: My son’s favorite present for Christmas. Easy to put together. My husband and I even ride it when he’s riding his bike.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Welds Come Loose
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this just over a month ago and the welds came loose and now cannot ride. Quite a waste of money on our part I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Moe Melching

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing not to like my granddaughter will love it
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scooter
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my 13 and 9 year old. They love them so much. I tried one of them and now I bought a third one for me lol.

customer_reviews.title: Price n Durability
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this I had to buy another for my youngest

customer_reviews.title: Fun and safe
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter juMped on this and took off!! Soo fun.

customer_reviews.title: No brakes
customer_reviews.text: Front brakes do not work and can find no customer service info. Scooter looks nothing like picture online

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price. Kids and adults love to ride it!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is a lot of fun. Both kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and goofy  parents!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this wiggle scooter and so do the neighborhood kids. I have even tried it a couple of times and it’s super fun. Great exercise too!
customer_reviews.author: babyArianna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for adults
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I'm a 190 lb mom and can ride on this with ease. Very sturdy and stable and smooth! Neighborhood fave.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: We are both having fun just like other customer said
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. Based on the weight limitation, I have tried several times and it fits me well. We are both having fun just like other customer said. This scooter is easy to put together and quite sturdy. I will update here if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Liu

product_meta.title: AODI Swing Scooter Adjustable 3 Wheels Foldable Wiggle Scooter Self Drifting for Kids/Adult Age 7 Years Old and Up
feature_bullets: Suitable for Various Age: The three-wheel scooter can suit teenagers or Adults playing scooters and close their gap to promote life, friendship, closeness, and family unity. There’s even a quick-response brake for increased control.

Adjustable Height Handlebar: The height Handlebars can be adjusted to the proper height to ride, the height can adjust between 95cm and 110cm. 3-wheels swing design adds scooter stability, and its 181-degree turn can transfer direction easily.

Propelled by Twisting your Hips, The three scooters develop kids’ body balance and coordination. The AODI SP01 features special technology designed for drifting and carving to pull off crazy moves. It’s so easy to make a U-turn. The plastic pedal plays an anti-skid function.

Easy for Storage and Transportation: The scooter can be easily folded so it is convenient for storage, traveling and transportation. Product size: 40.55 * 24.80 *（37.40-43.3）inch. (Folding size: 37.4 * 8.85 * 7.28 inches), Maximum Weight Capacity: 100kgs/220lb.

Important Hint: Those who wrote the brakes stopped working — brakes are made to be adjustable. Loosen the front wheel brake screws - pull wire tighter with needle-nose pliers - tighten the screw again. If you still haven't solved your problem, please contact the seller to send the tutorial video. With 1-Year Free Warranty!!!!!! We will fix or replace defective parts as well.
